# simple if statement
if condition
then {
    statement
}
fi


# if else statement
if condition
then {
    statement1
}
else {
    statement2
}
fi


# if elif statement
if condition
then {
    statement1
}
elif condition2
then {
    statement2
}
else {
    statement3
}
fi
